General.Name: Companhia Energética do Ceará - Coelce
General.Description: Companhia Energética do Ceará " COELCE engages in the electricity distribution services. It operates in 184 municipalities in the state of Ceará in Brazil. The company serves approximately 4.7 million consumer units. Companhia Energética do Ceará " COELCE is headquartered in Fortaleza, Brazil. Companhia Energética do Ceará " COELCE is a subsidiary of Enel Brasil S.A.
General.Address: Rua Padre Valdevino, Fortaleza, CE, Brazil

1.Name: Mr. Jose Nunes De Almeida Neto
1.Title: Director of Institutional Relations & Vice Chairman

2.Name: Mr. Teobaldo Jose Cavalcante Leal
